overview: Why there is always a prince and a princess? Why two princesses cannot marry? This short film is about a girl who is set to be married. Following the society norms, she is afraid to tell her family that she loves her best friend, that she is a lesbian. What happens when the news comes out on the day of the marriage? After all, ‘We don’t fall in love with the gender, we fall in love with a person.’
title: Love Knows no Gender
